data.actual_result: The order changes on you instantly, prone to making you accidentally invite someone else
data.expected_result: The friends/DM list should stay the same until you refresh it
data.short_description: Invite Modal's friends/DM list is dynamically updating when shown
data.steps_to_repro: - Open an invite modal on any server/channel - Have someone DM you or if you have another client open, DM someone
